languages.text: Огромная машина, раскаленная от работающей встроенной печи. На обводе топки видны следы крови и царапины — несомненно, сжигание живых людей было частью богомерзкого ритуала.

A huge machine, red-hot from a working built-in furnace. Traces of blood and scratches are visible on the bypass of the firebox — undoubtedly, the burning of living people was part of some blasphemous ritual.
languages.original_text: Огромная машина, раскаленная от работающей встроенной печи. На обводе топки видны следы крови и царапины — несомненно, сжигание живых людей было частью богомерзкого ритуала.

traits.locale_text: A huge machine, red-hot from a working built-in furnace. Traces of blood and scratches are visible on the bypass of the firebox — undoubtedly, the burning of living people was part of some blasphemous ritual.

A huge machine, red-hot from a working built-in furnace. Traces of blood and scratches are visible on the bypass of the firebox — undoubtedly, the burning of living people was part of some blasphemous ritual.

A huge machine, red-hot from a working built-in furnace. Traces of blood and scratches are visible on the bypass of the firebox — undoubtedly, the burning of living people was part of some blasphemous ritual.

languages.text: Una enorme máquina al rojo vivo por el horno activo que tiene incorporado. Puedes ver rastros de sangre y arañazos en el borde de la cámara de combustión: no cabe duda de que incinerar a personas vivas era parte de un ritual blasfemo.
languages.original_text: A huge machine, red-hot from a working built-in furnace. Traces of blood and scratches are visible on the bypass of the firebox — undoubtedly, the burning of living people was part of some blasphemous ritual.

traits.locale_text: Una enorme máquina al rojo vivo por el horno activo que tiene incorporado. Puedes ver rastros de sangre y arañazos en el borde de la cámara de combustión: no cabe duda de que incinerar a personas vivas era parte de un ritual blasfemo.

languages.text: 这台巨型机器内置的熔炉中正喷发着炽热的光芒，熔炉旁边可以看到血迹与抓痕。很显然，这个熔炉是用来焚烧活人的，这应该是某种亵渎仪式的一部分。
languages.original_text: A huge machine, red-hot from a working built-in furnace. Traces of blood and scratches are visible on the bypass of the firebox — undoubtedly, the burning of living people was part of some blasphemous ritual.

traits.locale_text: 这台巨型机器内置的熔炉中正喷发着炽热的光芒，熔炉旁边可以看到血迹与抓痕。很显然，这个熔炉是用来焚烧活人的，这应该是某种亵渎仪式的一部分。

languages.text: 中に組み込まれて作動している炉のおかげで赤く高熱になっている巨大な機械。火室の側管には、血の跡や引っ掻き傷が見て取れる…疑いもなく、生きた人間を焼くことが冒涜的な儀式の一部である。
languages.original_text: A huge machine, red-hot from a working built-in furnace. Traces of blood and scratches are visible on the bypass of the firebox — undoubtedly, the burning of living people was part of some blasphemous ritual.

traits.locale_text: 中に組み込まれて作動している炉のおかげで赤く高熱になっている巨大な機械。火室の側管には、血の跡や引っ掻き傷が見て取れる…疑いもなく、生きた人間を焼くことが冒涜的な儀式の一部である。

languages.text: Une énorme machine chauffée à blanc par un four intégré en activité. Des traces de sang et de griffures sont visibles sur la paroi de la chambre de combustion. À n'en pas douter, des personnes ont été brûlées vives ici dans le cadre d'un rituel blasphématoire.
languages.original_text: A huge machine, red-hot from a working built-in furnace. Traces of blood and scratches are visible on the bypass of the firebox — undoubtedly, the burning of living people was part of some blasphemous ritual.

traits.locale_text: Une énorme machine chauffée à blanc par un four intégré en activité. Des traces de sang et de griffures sont visibles sur la paroi de la chambre de combustion. À n'en pas douter, des personnes ont été brûlées vives ici dans le cadre d'un rituel blasphématoire.

languages.text: Eine große Maschine, glühend heiß durch einen aktiven eingebauten Ofen. Auf der Zuführung der Brennkammer sind Blutspuren und Kratzer erkennbar – zweifelsohne war das Verbrennen von Personen Teil eines blasphemischen Rituals.
languages.original_text: A huge machine, red-hot from a working built-in furnace. Traces of blood and scratches are visible on the bypass of the firebox — undoubtedly, the burning of living people was part of some blasphemous ritual.

traits.locale_text: Eine große Maschine, glühend heiß durch einen aktiven eingebauten Ofen. Auf der Zuführung der Brennkammer sind Blutspuren und Kratzer erkennbar – zweifelsohne war das Verbrennen von Personen Teil eines blasphemischen Rituals.

languages.text: İçerdiği çalışan fırından dolayı kızışmış devasa bir makine. Fırının kenarında kan izleri ve çizikler görülebiliyor. Şeytani bir ayinin parçası olarak insanların canlı canlı yakıldığından şüphe yok.
languages.original_text: A huge machine, red-hot from a working built-in furnace. Traces of blood and scratches are visible on the bypass of the firebox — undoubtedly, the burning of living people was part of some blasphemous ritual.
